law.text: Any person subject to this code who uses contemptuous words against the President or the Governor which may detrimentally affect the morale or effectiveness of any unit of the state military forces shall be punished as a court-martial may direct.
law.history: Amended 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 32, sec. 92, effective June 25, 2013. -- Created 1970 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 67.
